text: (He imanadharakanno!) Tumhi sarva sanga, amhi allahavara imana rakhale ani tyavarahi je amacyakade utaravile gele ani je ibrahima, isma'ila, isahaka, yakuba ani tyancya santativara utaravile gele ani je kahi allahacya tarphe musa, isa ani an'ya paigambaranna dile gele. Amhi tyancyapaiki konacyahi daramyana pharaka karita nahi. Amhi allahace tabedara ahota
